```{r}
source("laura_SU2C_GBM_GSCs_combined_explore_helpers.R")
library(Seurat)
library(SummarizedExperiment)

top.dir <- '~/projects/su2c_v2'
master_output_dir <- file.path(top.dir, '/results/scRNA')
## load scRNA data
data_dir <- '../../data/raw/scRNA/Data/GSCs_G800Removed_Nov2019'
data_file <- 'BTSC_G800L_removed_AUCell_SeuratObj.rds'
BTSC <- readRDS(file.path(data_dir, data_file))

```


## PCA Plots

``` {r}
AUC_names <- colnames(BTSC@meta.data)[grep('AUC$', colnames(BTSC@meta.data))]
score_regex <- 'Neftel|RNA.GSC.c[1-2]'
AUC_names <- AUC_names[grep(score_regex, AUC_names)]

make_dr_plots(BTSC, dim1 = 1, dim2 = 2, reduction.use = 'pca', feats_plot = c(AUC_names))
```
